tfs_work_item.description: Auxiliary information about a version of a TFS/VSTS/Azure DevOps work item.
tfs_work_item.$comment: Depends on gros/data-gathering vsts_fields.json. All fields are strings for cross-compatibility with older importers.

changelog_id.description: Sequential number of the version of the work item.

created_date.description: Momment when the work item is created.

reporter.description: Name of the developer who created the work item.

assignee.description: Name of the developer who is assigned to resolve the work item.

updated.description: Moment when the work item was changed for this version.

updated_by.description: Name of the developer who made the change to the work item for this version.

description.description: HTML description of the work item.

labels.description: Number of tags given to the work item.

attachments.description: Number of files uploaded as attachments to the work item.

project_name.description: Name of the project that the work item is for.

team_name.description: Name of the team that works on the work item.

sprint_name.description: Name of the sprint that the work item is worked in.

rank_change.description: Placement of the work item on the backlog.

additional_information.description: Acceptance criteria of the work item.

severity.description: Severity of the bug that the work item addresses.

business_value.description: Business value of the work item.

duedate.description: Moment when the work item is targeted to be completed.

story_points.description: Number of points assigned to a work item based on developer assessment of difficulty.

topdesk_number.description: Reference to a TopDesk request related to the work item.

use_case.description: Reference to another work item describing a use case for the work item.

encrypted.description: Whether the personal information fields related to the reporter, assignee and updater are encrypted.
